name: TetherBlade
description:
A fast paced arena shooter, where instead of shooting a bullet, you shoot a tether! Tether two objects together to fling them at each other and destroy them with physics

Controls-

WASD - to move
Left Click to shoot the tether

The tether explodes perpendicular to the shot, and it explodes when it reaches the position where your cursor was when you shot it, or after 1 second

Link to the Repo: https://github.com/TheRealFroggo/TetherBlade
